Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.jeopardy.service.ScoreManager
public class ScoreManager extends Object
Coordinates scoring for players using the Strategy pattern.

A ScoringStrategy implementation is used to determine how many points to add or subtract for a given question outcome. This allows scoring rules to be swapped at runtime (e.g. standard vs. double-points mode).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScoreManager()
    Creates a ScoreManager with the default StandardScoringStrategy.
    ScoreManager(ScoringStrategy scoringStrategy)
    Creates a ScoreManager with an explicit scoring strategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreManager

      public ScoreManager()
      Creates a ScoreManager with the default StandardScoringStrategy.

    • ScoreManager

      public ScoreManager(ScoringStrategy scoringStrategy)
      Creates a ScoreManager with an explicit scoring strategy.
      Parameters:
      scoringStrategy - the strategy to use for all score calculations

  • Method Details

    • setScoringStrategy

      public void setScoringStrategy(ScoringStrategy strategy)
      Sets the scoring strategy used to compute score changes.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the new ScoringStrategy to use. If null is passed, the current strategy is unchanged.

    • getScoringStrategy

      public ScoringStrategy getScoringStrategy()
      Returns the currently active scoring strategy.
      Returns:
      the ScoringStrategy in use

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(Player player, int questionValue, boolean isCorrect)
      Updates a player's score based on the given question value and result.

      The actual number of points to add or subtract is delegated to the configured ScoringStrategy. Positive results call Player.addPoints(int); negative results call Player.subtractPoints(int). A zero result leaves the score unchanged.

      Parameters:
      player - the player whose score should be updated
      questionValue - the value of the question (typically positive)
      isCorrect - true if the answer was correct, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player is null

    • calculatePotentialScore

      public int calculatePotentialScore(int questionValue, boolean isCorrect)
      Calculates the score delta that would be applied for the given question value and correctness, without modifying any player.
      Parameters:
      questionValue - the value of the question
      isCorrect - true if the hypothetical answer is correct
      Returns:
      the number of points that would be added (positive), subtracted (negative), or zero

    • getScoringStrategyName

      public String getScoringStrategyName()
      Returns the human-readable name of the active scoring strategy.
      Returns:
      the strategy name reported by ScoringStrategy.getStrategyName()
